abstrac: Expert Mechanical Engineer , Energy , Power, Structure, Modeling /Drafting ,Designing. Kitchen Design.Mechanical Design,Auto Cad 2D and 3D, and CAE analysis using LS-Dyna
bio:
TARUN KUMAR DUTTA

Expert Mechanical Engineer , Energy , Power, Structure, Modeling /Drafting ,Designing.

I have 12 years experience in industrial , production and academic projects as a mechanical engineer. My specialty in project based work that is Fog Dust suppression system, Plain water Dust suppression system , Dust Extraction system , Ventilation system , Air conditioning system split AC , ductable  AC 
Chiller AC those system consisting of designing of equipments as centrifugal pump, centrifugal fans ,air compressor , air receiver and air and water pipeline.

         And I also work in cold and hot insulation of pipeline and equipments .

I worked in renewable /sustainable projects and production field most of careers that is Industrial pollution control system and industrial EPM plate handling system and kitchen design , and kitchen equipment manufacturing.

        I also work in electro permanent magnet plate handling system electro permanent magnet lifter design and production.

The above mentioned system consist of lot of component which should be designed toughly to work appropriately . I have designed most of the structure 
Like spreader beam , cable reeling drum , chain and sprocket, hanging lifting lugs , shaft, coupling connection (nut bolt, weld, pin etc) 


      I also used Auto Cad 2007,2009, 2013 mechanical , inventor , solid works 
2D, 3D etc .And CAE analysis Using LS-Dyna Software I did prepare the report regarding Design/Drawing / Calculation /Constriction/ Manufacturing .

Work for long time period , I easily considered the time and budge of the client to fulfill the right designed object.
I AM WORKING 24X7 DAYS ,
